# requiredBillingAddressFields

**Instance Property**

A bit field of billing address fields that you need in order to process the transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
var requiredBillingAddressFields: PKAddressField { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest]. For possible values, see [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest].

## Deprecated

- **enabled**: All fields of the shipping contact on the payment sheet are editable by the user.
- **requiredShippingAddressFields**: A bit field of shipping address fields that you need in order to process the transaction.
- **PKAddressField**: Billing or shipping address fields.
- **billingAddress**: A prepopulated billing address.
- **shippingAddress**: A prepopulated shipping address.
